item.title: Fitting an Elephant with Four non-Zero Parameters
item.description: arXiv:2407.07909v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In 1953, Enrico Fermi criticized Dyson's model by quoting Johnny von Neumann: "With four parameters I can fit an elephant, and with five I can make him wiggle his trunk." So far, there have been several attempts to fit an elephant using four parameters, but as the problem has not been well-defined, the current methods do not completely satisfy the requirements. This paper defines the problem and presents an attempt.
item.dc:creator: Dian Jin, Junze Yuan
